Package: org.grails.datastore.gorm.mongo.geo

[Groovy] Class GeoJSONType<T>

      • org.grails.datastore.gorm.mongo.geo.GeoJSONType

      • Abstract class for persisting Shape instances in GeoJSON format. See http://geojson.org/geojson-spec.html

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        2.0
